name: Bill Tyros
summary: Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience in the video game, financial, and hospitality industries.

list.title: Senior Software Engineer @ Sonder
list: Developed a system in Ruby to migrate 300k+ bookings over to external systems.
Developed availability health metrics that contributed to a $10M year-over-year profit increase.
Developed a distribution system in Ruby to sync 50k+ listings on Airbnb, Booking, Expedia and more.
Refactored a 300k+ LOC legacy Ruby on Rails codebase, upgrading to Ruby 3.3 and Rails 7.1 for improved performance and maintainability.
Developed a pricing system in Python, optimizing rates based on supply/demand.

list.title: Software Engineer @ Morgan Stanley
list: Developed a system in Python to leverage data aggregated from internal and third-party sources to encourage 10k+ software developers to use best practices in their work.

list.title: Programmer @ Framestore VR
list: Developed an art asset pipeline in Python for Unreal Engine 4, creating C++ and Python plugins to automate workflows and improve production efficiency.

list.title: Programmer @ Borealys Games
list: Developed core gameplay systems and UI in Unity in C#.
Languages: Python, C#, TypeScript, JavaScript, Ruby, Go, C++.
CI/CD: GitHub Actions, Jenkins, CircleCI, Buddy.

list.title: Interactive Real-Time Systems Development @ University of Sherbrooke
